name: KANA DESTROYER 3000
description:
Do you find studying difficult or are unable to study normally? Are you traumatized by traditional educational instutions? Was your favorite song Lost One's Weeping growing up? Do you want to learn Japanese? This is the game for you! Learn hiragana/katakana(soon) while practicing your aim!

I made this for myself because no other method seemed to work, and now I am addicted to my own edutainment game. Hope it helps you too!

Coming soon!!1:

  • flip targets / hint
  • kana audio
  • katakana
  • difficulty
  • custom cards
  • scoring
  • special ability and meter
